fajr_description: The Fajr prayer consists of 4 rakats in total. You can select the part and rakat you wish to perform from the menu below.
sunnah_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the two rakats Sunnah of the Fajr prayer for the sake of Allah'. Say 'Allahu Akbar' (Opening Takbir) to begin.
sunnah_r1_s2_desc: Recite respectively: Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and at least three short verses or one long verse from the Quran.
sunnah_r1_s3_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
sunnah_r1_s4_desc: Rise saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', and when standing upright say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
sunnah_r1_s5_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and prostrate (say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times). Sit up, then prostrate a second time.
sunnah_r2_s1_desc: Stand up for the second rakat. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and another surah (or at least three verses).
sunnah_r2_s2_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
sunnah_r2_s3_desc: After rising from Ruku, perform two consecutive prostrations.
sunnah_r2_s4_desc: Sit after the second prostration. Recite Tashahhud (Attahiyat), Durood (Ibrahimiyyah), and Rabbana prayers. Turn your head right then left, saying 'As-salamu alaykum wa rahmatullah' to finish.
fard_r1_s1_desc: Men recite the Iqamah before the Fard. Make the intention for the two rakats Fard of Fajr prayer and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
fard_r1_s2_desc: Recite respectively: Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
fard_r1_s3_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
fard_r1_s4_desc: Rise saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', and when upright say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
fard_r1_s5_desc: Perform two consecutive prostrations. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times in each.
fard_r2_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and another surah.
fard_r2_s2_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
fard_r2_s3_desc: After rising from Ruku, perform two consecutive prostrations.
fard_r2_s4_desc: Sit and recite Tashahhud, Durood, and Rabbana prayers. Finish by giving Salam to the right and left.
dhuhr_description: The Dhuhr prayer consists of 10 rakats in total. You can select the part and rakat you wish to perform from the menu below.
dh_ruku_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
dh_kavme_desc: Rise saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', and when upright say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
dh_secde_desc: Perform two consecutive prostrations. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times in each.
dh_ilk_oturus_desc: Sit and recite only the Tashahhud (Attahiyat) prayer.
dh_son_oturus_desc: Sit and recite Tashahhud, Durood (Salli, Barik), and Rabbana prayers. Finish by giving Salam to the right and left.
dh_fs_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the four rakats first Sunnah of Dhuhr prayer for the sake of Allah'. Say 'Allahu Akbar' to begin.
dh_fs_r1_s2_desc: Recite respectively: Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and at least three short verses or one long verse from the Quran.
dh_r2_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
dh_r3_s1_desc: Stand up after the first sitting. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
dh_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
dh_f_r1_s1_desc: Men recite the Iqamah before the Fard. Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the four rakats Fard of Dhuhr prayer' and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
dh_f_r3_s1_desc: Stand up after the first sitting. Recite Bismillah and only Surah Al-Fatiha (do not recite an additional surah).
dh_f_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah and only Surah Al-Fatiha (do not recite an additional surah).
dh_ls_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the two rakats last Sunnah of Dhuhr prayer for the sake of Allah' and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
asr_description: The Asr prayer consists of 8 rakats in total. You can select the part and rakat you wish to perform from the menu below.
asr_ruku_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
asr_kavme_desc: Rise saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', and when upright say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
asr_secde_desc: Perform two consecutive prostrations. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times in each.
asr_son_oturus_desc: Sit and recite Tashahhud, Durood (Salli, Barik), and Rabbana prayers. Finish by giving Salam to the right and left.
asr_s_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the four rakats Sunnah of Asr prayer for the sake of Allah'. Say 'Allahu Akbar' to begin.
asr_s_r1_s2_desc: Recite respectively: Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and at least three short verses or one long verse from the Quran.
asr_s_r2_oturus_desc: Sit and recite the Tashahhud (Attahiyat) and Durood (Allahumma Salli, Allahumma Barik) prayers.
asr_s_r3_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite respectively: Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
asr_r2_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
asr_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
asr_f_r1_s1_desc: Men recite the Iqamah before the Fard. Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the four rakats Fard of Asr prayer' and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
asr_f_r2_oturus_desc: Sit and recite only the Tashahhud (Attahiyat) prayer.
asr_f_r3_s1_desc: Stand up after the first sitting. Recite Bismillah and only Surah Al-Fatiha (do not recite an additional surah).
asr_f_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah and only Surah Al-Fatiha (do not recite an additional surah).
maghrib_description: The Maghrib prayer consists of 5 rakats in total. Fard is performed first, followed by Sunnah.
ma_ruku_desc: Say 'Allahu Akbar' and bow down. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' 3 times.
ma_kavme_desc: Rise saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', and upright say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
ma_secde_desc: Perform two consecutive prostrations. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times in each.
ma_son_oturus_desc: Sit and recite Tashahhud, Durood, and Rabbana prayers. Finish by giving Salam to the right and left.
ma_f_r1_s1_desc: Men recite Iqamah first. Intend to pray 3 rakats Fard of Maghrib and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
ma_r1_s2_desc: Recite Subhanaka, A'udhu Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah from the Quran.
ma_r2_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah, Surah Al-Fatiha, and a surah.
ma_f_r2_oturus_desc: Sit and recite only the Tashahhud (Attahiyat).
ma_f_r3_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Bismillah and only Surah Al-Fatiha.
ma_s_r1_s1_desc: Intend to pray 2 rakats Sunnah of Maghrib and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
isha_subtitle: 4 First Sunnah • 4 Fard • 2 Last Sunnah • 3 Witr
isha_description: The Isha prayer consists of 13 rakats in total. You can proceed by selecting the part and rakat you want to perform from the menu below.
ya_ruku_desc: Bow down saying 'Allahu Akbar'. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal Azim' 3 times.
ya_kavme_desc: Rise up saying 'Sami'allahu liman hamidah', when fully standing say 'Rabbana lakal hamd'.
ya_secde_desc: Perform two consecutive prostrations. Say 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' 3 times in each.
ya_son_oturus_desc: While sitting, recite Attahiyat, Allahumma Salli, Allahumma Barik, and Rabbana. Conclude by turning your head right then left, saying 'As-salamu alaykum wa rahmatullah'.
ya_fs_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the 4 rakats First Sunnah of the Isha prayer for the sake of Allah'. Start by saying 'Allahu Akbar'.
ya_r1_s2_desc: Recite Subhanaka, A'udhu Basmalah, Surah Al-Fatihah, and at least three short verses or one long verse from the Quran.
ya_fs_r2_oturus_desc: While sitting, recite Attahiyat along with Allahumma Salli and Allahumma Barik.
ya_fs_r3_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Subhanaka, A'udhu Basmalah, Surah Al-Fatihah, and a short surah.
ya_r2_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Basmalah, Surah Al-Fatihah, and a short surah.
ya_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Basmalah, Surah Al-Fatihah, and a short surah.
ya_f_r1_s1_desc: Men recite the Iqamah before the Fard. Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the 4 rakats Fard of the Isha prayer' and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
ya_f_r2_oturus_desc: While sitting, recite only the Attahiyat.
ya_f_r3_s1_desc: Stand up after the first sitting. Recite Basmalah and only Surah Al-Fatihah (do not recite additional verses).
ya_f_r4_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Basmalah and only Surah Al-Fatihah (do not recite additional verses).
ya_ls_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the 2 rakats Last Sunnah of the Isha prayer' and say 'Allahu Akbar'.
ya_w_r1_s1_desc: Make the intention: 'I intend to offer the Witr prayer for the sake of Allah' and start by saying 'Allahu Akbar'.
ya_w_r2_oturus_desc: While sitting, recite only the Attahiyat.
ya_w_r3_s1_desc: Stand up. Recite Basmalah, Surah Al-Fatihah, and additional verses. Then raise your hands to your ears, say 'Allahu Akbar', fold them again, and recite the Qunut Duas.
